#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
void fibonacci(ll n)
{   ll f1,f2,a=5,b=4,f3,f4;

     f1 = ((a*n*n )+ b);
     f2 = ((a*n*n) - b);
     f3 = sqrt((ll)f1);
     f4 = sqrt((ll)f2);
     if(f1 == (f3*f3)|| f2 == (f4*f4))
        printf("Yes\n");
     else 
     printf("No\n");
}
 
int main()
{ int t;
ll n;
 scanf("%d", &t);
 while(t --) {
 	scanf("%lld", &n);
 	   fibonacci(n);
} 
  return 0;
}
